action.name: Set text
action.param: "Scared Man: No...no! Leave me alone! I need my Snuggles. They took my fluffy Snuggles... Bring me back my Snuggles!!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "*Whispers to Brad* What should we do now? Brad: Well, I feel that this guy just needs to get help. If we give him his Snuggles he will never learn to talk to others."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Brad: That looks like a sock puppet with 'Mr.Snuggles' sewn onto it. Is this that guy's 'friend'?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Shawn: I found your...uhm, Snuggles Scared Man: My Snuggles!! You, Leave me alone! Shawn: Yeah, you're welcome, no need to thank me or anything."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Sad Man: Why do we live in such a sad world? I just do not understand... I need comfort. Could you find me some chocolate? The nurses lock it up in a safe somewhere around here."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "*Whispers to Brad* What do we do now? Brad: We could help him, but it will require some work. Looks like the safe is locked so we'll have to find all the pieces of the combination."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "*You picked up one of the three notes"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "*You picked up one of the three notes"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "*You picked up one of the three notes"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "*You open the safe and pick up the chocolate"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Shawn: Here's your chocolate! Sad Man: Thank you... friend."
